value.name: Israeli forces mulling ground invasion as Hamas fires over 1,500 rockets
value.description: Israel’s military is considering the possibility of launching a ground campaign in the Gaza Strip as the Israel Defense Forces claim Iran-backed Hamas has fired over 1,500 rockets into Israel since Monday.
